name: CRNavigationController
summary: A UINavigationController subclass that brings about a more vivid, brighter UINavigationBar.
description: CRNavigationController is a UINavigationController subclass that brings about a more vivid, brighter UINavigationBar. In light of iOS 7 bringing us the wonders of translucency, it's difficult to obtain bright and flush colors. This library solves that predicament.
